type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.LenientConfiguration
type.description: Resolved configuration that does not fail eagerly when some dependencies are not resolved, or some artifacts do not exist.

method.name: getArtifacts
method.description:
Gets successfully resolved artifacts for dependencies that match given dependency spec.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:successfully resolved artifacts for dependencies that match given dependency spec

method.name: getFiles
method.description:
Returns successfully resolved files for successfully resolved dependencies.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:resolved dependencies files

method.name: getFirstLevelModuleDependencies
method.description:
Returns successfully resolved dependencies.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:only resolved dependencies

method.name: getUnresolvedModuleDependencies
method.description:
returns dependencies that were attempted to resolve but failed. If empty then all dependencies are neatly resolved.

returns:only unresolved dependencies

property.name: artifacts
property.description:
Gets successfully resolved artifacts for dependencies that match given dependency spec.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:successfully resolved artifacts for dependencies that match given dependency spec

property.name: files
property.description:
Returns successfully resolved files for successfully resolved dependencies.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:resolved dependencies files

property.name: firstLevelModuleDependencies
property.description:
Returns successfully resolved dependencies.
param:dependencySpec dependency spec

returns:only resolved dependencies

property.name: unresolvedModuleDependencies
property.description:
returns dependencies that were attempted to resolve but failed. If empty then all dependencies are neatly resolved.

returns:only unresolved dependencies
